resources.string: Izingxoxo ezilalelwayo nezingemuva azikaze zithunyelwe ku-Google ngaphandle kwemvume yakho
Idivayisi yakho izohlola imisindo ofuna ukwaziswa ngayo, njengalapho kukhala i-alamu yentuthu noma kukhala ingane

Lapho usebenzisa i-Live Transcribe, ungakwazi:
  1.  Ukuthayipha izimpendulo zokuloba ozibona esikrinini
  2.  Ukuthola izexwayiso lapho igama lakho likhulunywa
  3.  Ukusesha ngaphakathi kokuloba

I-Google icubungula izingxoxo zakho, kodwa ayilokothi izigcine
I-Live Transcribe ibonisa inkulumo njengombhalo esikrinini sakho ukuze ubambe iqhaza ezingxoxweni eziseduze nawe kalula
